page.title: 03Livestock On The Farm
page.content: In 1985 , 1042 cattle were owned by the farm , 637 for milk , 128 calves , and 277 for slaughter . They are mostly Friesians . The cows go into three herds , each with as herdsman . The milk goes to Unigate Ltd. . Milked twice a day , each cow produces 5200 litres every year . There are 4881 sheep , of which 52 are rams , 2004 ewes , and 2825 lambs. They are mostly Blue-faced Leicester and Swaledale mixed with Suffolk and Hampshire rams . There are two shepherds , and four men shear . Each fleece weighs about 3 Kilograms . There are no other animals on the farm .
